original_text: Paul and Barnabas heard what the people wanted to do. So they tore their own clothes to show that they were very upset. They ran into the middle of the crowd, 15 and they shouted, ‘Stop! You people should not do this. We are only men like you. We are not gods. We came here to tell you some good news about the great God. You must stop worshipping these gods who are really nothing. Instead worship the God who lives. He made the sky, the earth and the sea. He also made everything that is in them.
korean_text: 두 사도 바나바와 바울이 듣고 옷을 찢고 무리 가운데 뛰어 들어가서 소리 질러

sentences.original_text: what the people wanted to do
So they tore their own clothes
to show that they were very upset
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 매우 화났다는 것을 보이기 위해

sentences.original_text: They ran into the middle of the crowd
You people should not do this
We are only men like you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 여러분과 같은 그저 사람일 뿐입니다

sentences.original_text: We came here to tell you
some good news about the great God
You must stop worshipping these gods
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분은 이 신들을 경배하는 것을 멈추어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Instead worship the God who lives
He made the sky, the earth and the sea
He also made everything that is in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 안에 있는 모든 것들도 만드셨습니다
